net.hudup.core.logistic

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.logistic.AbstractRunner
      • net.hudup.core.logistic.Counter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Runner

    public class Counter
extends AbstractRunner
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class shows a time counter in text form "hours: minutes: seconds". Because it class is a runner by extending AbstractRunner, it updates automatically the time counter in text form "hours: minutes: seconds".
    Version:
    11.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • task

        protected void task()
        Description copied from class: AbstractRunner
        The actual tasks (works) which are performed when runner is running. This method should not be synchronized because it is called inside the loop of run method.
        Specified by:
        task in class AbstractRunner
